name: Fish Firework
description:
Players: 1-2, LAN and Internet
Level: 1 (others are planned)
Features: Underwater theme, multiplicative power ups, smooth camera transitions

Controls W, A, S, D Move Around Space Shoot QUse Barrier

To play the game with a friend, you need to forward port 7777 (Protocol: UDP) on your router when hosting the game! Playing on LAN you can use the IP that is displayed in the menu, for playing over the internet, use the IP at whatismyip.com!

Credits 

Patrick Keßler

Sound Design

Charlotte Kügler

Environment & Enemy Concpets, Environment Models

Jan Gihr

Everything else

State of the Game

This game was made as a prototype for an university class under the
topic of learning the basics of networking as well as executing some
basic programming patterns.

I most likely will not expand it in terms of mechanics but there is a good chance that I will update the game soon to feature multiple levels and a bit more playtime.
